title: awesome 1980s movie
review: This movie was amazing. I loved the action. even though that movie was back in the 80's it is still great.

title: Good war movie
review: When I saw this movie with my dad it was really funny. The Comedy was great. The movie was slow but it was good.

title: Very good futuristic movie
review: This movie was like watching a game play. It was amazing. The movie was also a little funny.

title: Great marvel movie
review: This movie brought together all the marvel characters. It was great. The action was awesome. I am team Marvel.

title: Suspense and tension created bigger scares than the jumpscares
review: Finally a stinkinnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn non demonic horror movie. I would say 97% of horror movies are demonic. I could count a million demonic horror movies. movie had amazing story line, best movie of all time.

title: another great marvel movie
review: The action was awesome, great job marvel. Marvel keep up the amazing great work. Again I am team marvel.
